definitions.definition: Any plant of the genus Euphorbia , a diverse genus of over 2,000 species.
Any plant of the spurge family, Euphorbiaceae .
A plant resembling those in genus Euphorbia in some aspect of its appearance.

main_definition: Any plant of the genus Euphorbia , a diverse genus of over 2,000 species.
secondary_definitions: Any plant of the spurge family, Euphorbiaceae .
A plant resembling those in genus Euphorbia in some aspect of its appearance.
